mapper.insert: insert into sys_group (group_id, group_name, create_date) values (#{groupId}, #{groupName}, now())
insert into sys_group_user (group_id, username, leader) values (#{groupId}, #{username}, #{leader});
mapper.select: select g.group_id, g.group_name, m.username, m.leader, u.full_name from sys_group_user m left join sys_group g on m.group_id = g.group_id left join sys_user u on m.username = u.user_name order by m.group_id
